newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Bovespa sees 75.2 mln reais net outflows April 1-1.
newsitem.headline: Bovespa sees 75.2 mln reais net outflows April 1-1.

text.p: Sao Paulo Stock Exchange (Bovespa) said it registered a 75.285 million reais net foreign capital outflows in the first 18 days of April.
Foreign buys totalled 2.336 billion reais, while foreign sales amounted to 2.411 billion reais in the period, it said in a statement.
So far this year, net foreign investment in the bolsa has totalled 898.157 million reais, it added.
